Text: Why is this zipped? Kind of redundant considering it is already RARed as a CBR file.
just change the file extension to cbz, opens just fine with comicrack, and quit b!+ching, thx MM82
I appreciate your effort and long-time uploads, but this is messy.  This zip unpacks to a bunch of jpg's not a cbr...
Don't unpack the file, just rename it to .cbr, the file itself is fine, just the name is borked.
